channel.title: CVE Feed for Simple Image Gallery -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Simple Image Gallery -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39313|2024-09-16T16:33:07.823Z -- simple%20image%20gallery -- simple%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Simple Image Gallery WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the msg parameter found in the ~/simple-image-gallery.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.6.
